translations.translation: When We rescued him and all his family -
Wherefore We saved him and his entire family
(Call to mind) when We delivered him and all his kinsfolk,
We rescued him and his whole family,
When We rescued him and his entire household.
When We saved him and his family, all,
When We delivered him and his followers, all--
when We delivered him and his people all together,
When We saved him and his household, every one,
We saved him and all his people,
Recall what time We delivered him and his household, all.
When We delivered him and all his family,
Behold, We delivered him and his adherents, all
When We saved him and his family, all,
We saved him and all his kinsmen,
We saved him and his family, all of them.
[So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
[37:134] mention, when We delivered him together with all his family,
(When We saved him and his household) his two daughters: Za'ura and Raytha, (every one,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: اذكر يا أكمل الرسل للمعتبرين المؤمنين وقت { إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ } أي: لوطاً { وَأَهْلَهُ } أي: أولاده وأهل بيته { أَجْمَعِينَ * إِلاَّ عَجُوزاً } [الصافات: 134-135] وهي: امرأته بقيت { فِي ٱلْغَابِرِينَ } [الصافات: 135] الهالكين بالعذاب المنزل عليهم بشؤم فعلتهم الشنيعة، المتناهية في القباحة والشناعة
